title: unnaippOl uLLam urugik-karuNai
sahitya:
unnaippOl uLLam urugik-karuNai koLLum annai pOl endanai aNaivOrillai murugA


anupallavi

  cennaik-kanda kOTTam tannil unnai nADum anbar tunbam OTTum anbu kATTu maNNilE


caraNam    kAruNya sIruDaiya kanda vELE undanadu kazhalaDi tEDi vandu tozhum aDiyEn tollai
tIrumAru krpai kUrak-kOrum pOdellAm vAri vArip-pEraruLai vazhanga vENum ayyanE
